meanings.definition: Of or relating to a uroboros, a symbol depicting a serpent or dragon eating its own tail.
meanings.sent1: The uroboric symbol showed a serpent eating its own tail.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful painting of the uroboric dragon.
meanings.sent3: The uroboric design on the ring looked fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were uroboric, constantly circling back on themselves.
meanings.sent5: The uroboric imagery in the story left a lasting impression on the readers.

meanings.sent1: The uroboric behavior of the company led to its downfall.
meanings.sent2: His uroboric tendencies caused harm to himself and others.
meanings.sent3: The uroboric nature of the situation was both concerning and puzzling.
meanings.sent4: The relationship had an uroboric quality, constantly consuming itself.
meanings.sent5: The uroboric pattern of destruction repeated itself throughout history.
